text_en: Students with visual impairment sit in front. Both blackboard and whiteboard provide such students with different preferences possibilities.
text_sw: Wanafunzi wenye uoni hafifu wanakaa mbele. Ubao mweusi au mweupe unawapa wanafunzi fursa ya kuchagua.

text_en: The students with visual impairment are placed together with sighted students.
text_sw: Wanafunzi wenye uoni hafifu wanawekwa pamoja na wanafunzi wenye kuona.

text_en: Then the students can help each other.
text_sw: Kisha wanafunzi wanaweza kusaidiana wenyewe kwa wenyewe

text_en: Adapted conditions make it is easier to learn.
text_sw: Hali zilizo boreshwa hufanya ujifunzaji kuwa rahisi zaidi

text_en: A sighted peer tells his blind classmate what is written on the board.
text_sw: Mwenzi anayeona anamueleza asiyeona kilichoandikwa ubaoni

text_en: The students and the teacher do all cooperate.
